title: The merger between Tele2 and Com Hem is completed - Tele2
snippet: Each share in Com Hem will be exchanged for 1.0374 new shares of class B in Tele2 and SEK 37.02 in cash. Com Hem shareholders will receive the Tele2 shares i.e. the non-cash merger consideration on November 7, 2018 and the cash merger consideration ...

title: Tele2 sees higher synergies from Com Hem merger, Q4 profit matches forecast | Reuters
snippet: The company said it now expects annual synergies from the merger with Com Hem of 1.35 billion Swedish crowns ($145.98 million), versus its previous guidance of 900 million crowns, after identifying additional cost savings.

title: Tele2 completes Com Hem merger | Total Telecom
snippet: News The merger will allow Tele2 to offer its customers fully converged quad-play tariffs The merger between Scandinavian telecoms giant Tele2 and broadband and pay-TV specialists Com Hem has been…

title: Tele2 closes Com Hem acquisition - Mobile World Live
snippet: Last month Tele2 updated its full-year guidance for a second consecutive quarter after a strong performance during Q3. At the time, Kirkby said the final quarter before closing the acquisition was again one “of solid business trends”, adding the Com Hem deal will take Tele2’s “customer-focussed strategy” to a higher level.
